attributes.action: STOP-charities demand right to die law for children
attributes.additional_details:
Not under any circumstances should charities  called "Together" or  any other organisations be allowed to lobby for legislation to encompass a law for the 'end of life' of children by euthanasia.

We would not be a civilised country by going down this route.

Belgium has gone down this route in 2002 and now making recent amendments to this law, we must not allow ourselves to go down this path.  This is the killing of children. Who could morally approve of euthanasia to young children?

No-one wants children to suffer unnessarily, parents and society should be able to give the love and care to their children with the use of medication to prolong their young life rather than end it.

Their are too many politicians and groups ready to make decisions on behalf of the population.  This opens the doors to the many laws that the uk population does not have a say.

This law must not be passed.  Please give your support.
